ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
list=[]
if(/查看更多章节/.test(result)){
	list=java.getElements('class.chapter-list.1@tag.li')
	}else{
		list=java.getElements('class.chapter-list@tag.li')
		}
list
</js>a
ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
text.查看更多章节.1@href
<js>
if(result!=''){
base=source.getKey()

re=java.ajax(base+result[0])
java.setContent(re,'')
lis=java.getElements('class.page_num@tag.option')
list=[]
for(var i=1;i<lis.length;i++){
	java.setContent(lis[i],'')
	surl=lis[i].attr('value')
	list.push(surl)
	}
	list
	}
</js>
